import React,{useState} from 'react' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' import {Container,Row,Col,Form,Button,Breadcrumb} from 'react-bootstrap' import {useDispatch} from 'react-redux' import {saveShippingAdress} from '../actions/cartAction' const ShippingAdress = ({history}) => { const dispatch=useDispatch() const [input, setInput]=useState([]) function handleChange(e){ setInput({...input,[e.target.name]:e.target.value}) } function handleSubmit(e){ e.preventDefault() dispatch(saveShippingAdress(input)) history.push('/payment') } return ( <> Cart Shipping Payment Checkout

Shipping Adress

 ) } export default ShippingAdress
